title: Vayu - Book Auto/Cab – Apps on Google Play | Khushi Patel
description:
I recently had use the Vayu app by Passdn in Ahmedabad to find auto, and I’m thoroughly impressed! 👏🏻
With over 1500 active drivers, finding a ride was incredibly easy and quick—just a few minutes, and I was on my way. Not only was the service efficient, but the ride was also more affordable than other apps.
A big shoutout to Keval Sondarva the founder of Vayu, for building such a user-friendly and reliable service. 💯
Vayu is truly making a difference in Ahmedabad’s ride-hailing space by combining convenience, cost-effectiveness, and accessibility.
If you're in Ahmedabad and need a reliable way to get around, I highly recommend giving Vayu a try! You won’t be disappointed.
Check it out here: https://lnkd.in/dwfvaFbQ 
#VayuApp #Ahmedabad #Innovation

title:
Swagatam Amdavad | Introducing Ahmedabad’s very own auto/cab booking Start-up - the Vayu app.
Vayu is an app where you can get Rewards on every ride and you... | Instagram
description:
2,197 likes, 42 comments - swagatam__amdavad on December 9, 2024: "Introducing Ahmedabad’s very own auto/cab booking Start-up - the Vayu app.
Vayu is an app where you can get Rewards on every ride and you pay 100% to the drivers.
Vayu offers safe and affordable Auto/Cab rides.
Vayu is getting started with Auto/Cab booking, soon you will see BRTS, Metro, and many modes of mobility in 1 app.
It’s a start-up started by 2 young engineering grads after talking with 500+ drivers and users, They got to know about that there is a need for a new App that provides good service for customers as well as drivers
Vayu is supported by GUSEC and SSIP.

Free ride on 16 Dec.
0% Commission app
Ahmedabad very own app
Rewards on every ride
Future Single app for any mode of transport
So Get your free ride.
📅 When?
December 16, 2024
📍 Where?
Across Ahmedabad
✨ Ride for FREE with #GowithVayu!
How to claim:
⿡ Download the Vayu App.
⿢ Book your ride on Dec 16.
⿣ Enjoy your free ride with 100% Cashback.
Tag your squad & spread the word—seats are limited! 🚌
.
Terms & Considerations Applied.

#ahmedabad #amdavad #ahmedabad_instagram #vayu #reels 
.".
